thread.title: Nozzolio looks to close loophole allowing killers to profit from their crimes
thread.title_full: Nozzolio looks to close loophole allowing killers to profit from their crimes

title: Nozzolio looks to close loophole allowing killers to profit from their crimes
text:
Published By: Finger Lake Times - Today 
State Sen. Michael Nozzolio wants to close a loophole that he says allows convicted killers to profit from their crimes....
